location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting copy of a letter sent on 22 January from C W Elwoodon, Agent to the Government at Porebunder [Porbandar, India], containing intelligence on six Joasimese [Qasimi] boats which captured two Bombay boats in Carachee [Karachi] on 14 January.
